Represents .mod music.

void SetLoop (  Bool  loop  ) 
 

Select looping playback mode for this music.

Parameters:
loop - True for looping playback, False for one time only.

void SetPan (  DWord  pan  ) 
 

Sets this music pan value.

Pan value ranges from 0 ( left ) to 255 ( right ), default is 128( normal ).

Parameters:
pan - new desired pan value.

void SetSpeed (  DWord  Speed  ) 
 

Sets this music playback speed.

Parameters:
speed - new desired speed. 128 is normal speed.

void SetVolume (  DWord  volume  ) 
 

Sets this music volume.

Volume ranges from 0( total silence ) to 64( max volume ).

Parameters:
volume - new desired volume for this music.
